data.title: Slumping Tesla Stock Headed Into Test of 2019 Low
data.text: Tesla has reversed at major resistance and could break June lows in coming months.

data.title: Elon Musk: Spotify is “coming” to Tesla vehicles in North America
data.text: Tesla owners in the U.S. and Canada may finally get that free Spotify Premium integration they’ve been asking for.

data.title: 3 Reasons to Park Tesla Stock and Leave
data.text: Given the bearish outlook for the broader markets, it’s no surprise that Tesla stock absorbed a punishing blow. But considering the myriad challenges ahead, TSLA is due for even more volatility.
